university.degree: Master's degree of Digital Innovation, Computer Science
university.description:
Epitech offers training over 5 years and delivers the title of Expert in Information Technologies.

Its pedagogy is the opposite of traditional teaching, where it works by projects.
The student is autonomous and gradually becomes self-taught. he is the master of his time and of his organization at school.

Programming is covered exclusively.
There is no theory and the student learns by doing on given topics and programming languages.

afd_tech.description:
Part-time internship in Full Stack Mobile Developement with React Native and Node.js (Express.js, Sequelize, PostgreSQL & MAMP).

I built a mobile app planner & organizer tool (Android & iOS) to help the company handling different tasks, projects, files and clients at the same time.

beconbe.description: Freelance as a Web Developer in charge of creating the company's website showcase with Wordpress from scratch.

capgemini.description:
Permanent position as a Fullstack Web Developer in React.js & Java.

As part of the Artemis program, the "Ministry of Armed Forces" needed a platform to analyse and manipulate graphs.
Thanks to that solution, it's possible to identify and find the root of various sources of informations.

cnrs.description:
Resumption of the development of a web app that raise awareness of daily household consumption.

The web application help the user to better understand his daily energy consumption.
He can view his electricity consumption in detail, can enter his consumption manually and can access an histogram that compare data with another similar household.

radisson_blu.description:
Intern as a Systems and Network Assistant Manager for the beginning of my 2nd year at Epitech.
Which brought me to set up and analyse a computer park, find solutions to IT users daily problems (IT support) and automate tasks using: GPO, Active Directory, Network Protocols (TCP, FTP, IPV4 and IPV6)

wellup.description:
Fixed a visual bug on the wellup.fr platform.
The site offers an online appointment booking solution with a therapist.

personal_dashboard.description: Music Sheet Recognizer (MSR) highlights basic Image Processing and Recognition. Like Optical Character Recognition
